title: Manitou The Sky People Saga
description: My name is Wray Sky. As an infant, I was adopted into a Ute family, but that’s not where this story begins.This is the part when my life, at age fifteen, gets super strange. Actually, my life got turned upside down when my parents were murdered. I didn’t know it at the time, but their murder wasn't exactly random and the gunmen come after me next. That isn't even the scariest part.I found an odd skull that has magical properties. Only, I don't believe in magic.
author: Lexus Luke
